news.title: 古巴边防部队击沉美籍快艇致4死
news.title0: Four shot dead on US-registered speedboat by border guards, Cuba says
news.content: 古巴称一艘美国注册快艇闯入其水域并向巡逻船开火，边防部队还击，造成船上4人死亡、6人受伤。
news.content0: Four people who entered Cuban waters on a US-registered speedboat have been shot dead by border guards, Cuba's government said.
